definition: Ai (c. 2000 BC), sixth of legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Li 釐|厘[Li2]
sorrow/grief/pity/to grieve for/to pity/to lament/to condole

sentences.english: Or grieve at my Fate, when I know 'tis in vain?
sentences.chinese: 或哀怨我的命運，當我知道這一切都是徒勞？

sentences.english: Grieved emotion is the heavy experience, it is difficult to disappear.
sentences.chinese: 哀怨情感內斂凝聚，是沉重的體驗，易鬱結不散。

sentences.english: He stretched himself on her threshold and uttered his complaints to the cruel bolts and bars .
sentences.chinese: 他匍伏在她門檻上對着冷酷無情的插銷門栓傾訴哀怨。

sentences.english: Even the tormented Byron seemed to enjoy himself in this celestial mountainscenery.
sentences.chinese: 即使是有些哀怨的拜倫似乎都很享受這裏的仙境。

sentences.english: Demanded, plaintively, the drunkest of the three.
sentences.chinese: 三個中喝得最醉的一位哀怨地問道。

sentences.english: The image of autumn was embodiment of poets' plaint and symbol of decline.
sentences.chinese: 秋既是騷人哀怨的體現，又是盛世衰落的象徵。

sentences.english: It will even bring a kind of sad feeling to somebody.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至會給人帶來一種哀怨的感覺。

sentences.english: Green smoke, but also the sad floating Rui Yan.
sentences.chinese: 青煙裏，還飄着嚴蕊的哀怨。

sentences.english: The four cannons echoed each other mournfully.
sentences.chinese: 這四門炮相互間的回聲都淒厲哀怨。

sentences.english: I fell in love with the subtly plaintive timbre of the Qiang flute.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡上了羌笛那略帶哀怨的音色。

sentences.english: Lonely under oil paper umbrellas, still covered clove sad?
sentences.chinese: 寂寞的油紙傘下，是否還遮掩着丁香的哀怨？

sentences.english: Why won't the whimpering whippoorwill whistle?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼哀怨的北美夜鷹小聲不說話了？

definition: to feel compassion for/to pity on/to feel sorry for
